name: Love Is A Funny Thing
description:
Made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

This is a short platformer with puzzle elements about a man rescuing his wife from the underworld.

Constraining to the theme 'joined together,' the player must juggle control between the 2 playable characters, who are 'joined together' by a button.

The game features 3 stages with unique re-used elements, sick pixel art, and a rockin' 4 song chiptune soundtrack.

There are many different ways to get around each obstacle, so if you get stuck, try something else!

Concept, coding, scripting, mechanic design, level design, and music by MetalKamina.

Art by Arsen-NET and MetalKamina.

Enjoy!
